website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, "larger than average" flatware for a reasonable price.
pros: Serrated knives can cut through steak
Includes a hostess set and 12 place settings
cons: This European-sized flatware set may require an extra-large storage tray

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Flatwear Set
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set. I read mixed reviews about rust showing up after using the dishwasher. I have not had that experience at all. They are a nice weight, well balanced and would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Adding to my set, love this flatware
customer_reviews.text: I am ordering more . . . I love this silverware. Washes beautifully, very pretty, feels good in the hands. Knives work well! Solid.
customer_reviews.author: T. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Rusted On First Wash, Maybe Fine Set If Handwashing Only
customer_reviews.text: These really do look nice, and they are a nice medium to lightweight set with good balance. I would have been very happy with them if the knives hadn't rusted on the very FIRST dishwasher cycle run. The rust was just a few spots near the serrated cutting edge. I didn't take a picture since others have uploaded some. I thought those other rust photos were maybe just a bad set, but whatever the reason, the same happened to ours. Too bad. For reference, I had another set I bought maybe 20 years ago that I've always dishwashed, and not a spot of rust on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Good (but not great) quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. They have a good weight and they look amazing. The reason for the three star rating is that even after following the care instructions, the knives are starting to rust severely on the handles and rust spotting on the blade itself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Viera

customer_reviews.title: Best ever and I mean that
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Would I be disclosing too much if I said this is the first flatware set I've bought in more than 30 years? And may I add that I'm very picky about looks, weight, shiny-ness, durability, and price (one feature for each star, see above)? This is a fantastic set; sadly, I haven't been paid to say that. But I would buy it again even if I had to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with a bit of tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Happy thus far with this set after a little over a months use. They weren't as heavy as I expected them to be, but its not a deterrent by any means. Quality seems good, and obviously they function like they should. Dish washing them has proven fine, but I did notice a few rust like spots appearing. I contributed that to the manufacturers recommendation that you need to use the heat dry setting which I normally don't, and so after having turned it on, the spots stopped appearing. Regardless, no evidence of permanent damage to the pieces and I'm still happy with them. A big recommend!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN BAUM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I read the directions for care. I pre-wash my utensils before washing them in the dishwasher. Upon removing them from the dishwasher I towel dry them to assure no spots. This is what one of my knives looks like after a few months. So far I do not see the same problem on the other utensils but this needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bit plain but they’re stainless....if you wash by hand.
customer_reviews.text: We use Lemme Shine in our dishwasher and the first thing I read was not to use lemon to wash them with. Now I hand wash the cutlery and dry them immediately and put them away. My husband does not like the weight of them but I’ll take that over stainless steel that stains.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CookerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight!
customer_reviews.text: The set is pretty, and I liked it until I picked up a fork. It weighed less than any fork I've ever held! I bought it because of the name, there were others that looked good, but I trusted Henckels. I've always used their knives. I'm thinking about returning it, but that would be a real pain. Next time I'll try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bootbaby

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flatware! We ordered this to replace what we had after losing many spoons and a few other pieces. The new pieces are very sturdy and comfortable to use, and beautifully finished. They look very high end and we're very pleased with this purchase. They've been put in the dishwasher and there is no discoloration or spots showing. We can highly recommend this flatware for every day use and for special occasions.. Would also be great as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer  from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a nice set of stainless flatware locally, so took a chance on this one. It arrived in excellent condition and appeared to be just what I wanted. After several dish-washings, these utensils still look like new - no evidence of staining or rusting. I wanted service for 12 so I did not have to do dishes every day, and that has worked out as planned. This set is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Silverware is very sleek in design.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel of this silverware, it is not too heavy on the ends but evenly distributed from end to end. The forks are just the right size and not too small or too large, knives are just the right weight. Really like this silverware, very shiny and easy to clean. I would recommend hand washing just like the steak knives and not putting into the dishwasher. I have tried about 6 different sets of everyday silverware and these are by far the nicest.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after returning another set that was very flimsy and light. This set is much nicer; good weight to it, doesn't feel like it's going to bend, looks nice. Knives are a good level of sharpness for butter/table knives. If there's a downside, they do spot in the dishwasher very readily. Every wash there's at least one that has spots on it, although they come off with a little hand wiping and water generally. I'm not sure if that's on the flatware or on my dishwasher, though, so take with appropriate salt. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this silverware service. It’s beautiful and classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: shaeLee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. These are not only much smaller than typical ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. These are not only much smaller than typical flatware, they also show some corrosion already. The set seems to lack the chromium content which does not make it a true 18/10 stainless steel like the description claims. Now I'm looking at my Henckels knife set in a whole new way :(.
customer_reviews.author: GARRY

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a Costco brand. Because after the many years they started to tarnish and some pieces were missing. The discription would have you believe that they are a nice and sturdy. Not the case although shiny (had them for More that 3 months) they are very like weight. Next to the older pair they look and feel cheaply made. Only time will tell if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Alpine hunterS

customer_reviews.title: what happened to the details?
customer_reviews.text: The sugar spoon could have been better quality for it's name brand, looks like a crinkled piece of metal instead of the traditional scalloped pattern. Other than that, its hardy enough and not bad looking.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: You could be fine with a flatware set from Target or Walmart, but this set just looks better and feels better in the hand. I bought a set for my mom for Christmas, and when I moved out of the basement, I bought my own set. LOL. I have not seen any rust issues and these get daily use and are washed in a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the product. We had been looking for a set that was heavyweight,and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: thomas w.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and excellent value for money. I love the simple design. Nice weight. Been using for two months with 7 adults so pretty much ran through dishwasher every day and they have held up well. No rust spots or issues. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: S. KB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome silverware
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. It’s my 2nd purchase. Found I needed more pieces for family dinners! My niece asked if she can have it when I die! LOL Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mokiki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them on a daily basis for 10 months. They are excellent quality, great value for money! Recomend them undoubtedly!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great finish, good size and good weight
customer_reviews.text: Great weight, size and finish. Good so far I am not real picky and have only bought flatware one other time in my life and this set surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat ware
customer_reviews.text: Only had one dislike. They could have been a bit more heavier.
customer_reviews.author: George Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The silver ware is pretty it it seems very thin and not nearly as sturdy as I was hoping. I trusted that Henckel was a better brand. Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A fellow conservative

customer_reviews.title: Very Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight flatware. Good looking, but if you are looking for silverware with heft, this is not the set for you.
customer_reviews.author: cohocook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement set for standard household use.
customer_reviews.text: Large set of dishwasher safe cutlery is classic shape and perfect to replace your old mismatched sets. We just donated the old stuff to the goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice! I had been looking for the most simple and unembellished set of flatware. These were the best for quality and price. They are a solid weight and well made. I have not seen any pitting or spotting at all. You will not be disappointed with this flatware!
customer_reviews.author: wdgolf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice silverware!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Shiny. Washes well in the dishwasher. Lighter than my older silverware, but still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: appalacia

customer_reviews.title: Regret
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made an it gives the name a very bad review I was suppose to return it but with everything that’s going on it slip me
customer_reviews.author: judy. thomas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. These are not "stainless". They stain easily and require special care... Not something you need for every day use utensils.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the weight
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item ... I did not like the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marney T. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. Look like high quality but I haven’t had them that long
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight, sturdy set. Beautifully simple design and functional enough to use even as steak knives.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper88

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My husband and I had been looking to replace our cheapo Target set with something we would be using for the next several decades. While I can't attest to how long they will last, they are simple and beautiful, and the weight feels very nice in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flatware at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for a long time to find a Flatware set that was 18/10, a good price, and had nice pattern. This set is perfect! It’s sturdy, washes well in the dishwasher and was a great price. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed by this flatware. It looks and feels cheap. One of the fork tines actually bent out of shape when it was used! I am very unhappy with this purchase. Unfortunately I didn't get a look at the flatware before they were used. Otherwise I would have set them back. I expected better quality from Henckels. I do a slow burn everytime I open the silverware drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and simple
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and simple! Weve had ours 2 years and they still look brand new. I recently purchased another set because I was so pleased and want to make sure we always have enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas about 5 months ago and they really look beautiful. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for Christmas about 5 months ago and they really look beautiful. However, I have to take one star off because some of the knifes are starting to get spots where the blade part meets the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Olsen

customer_reviews.title: It is good looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter. It is good looking and well made. The only complaint is that the knife handles are solid and not hollow giving the impression of Oneida or Gorham design. That is my fault I should have checked for that before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flatware Set!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this set for very long, however I’m very happy with my purchase for the price paid. They have simple yet elegant appearance, while having a perfect weight and shine! 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect and beautiful for all occasions!
customer_reviews.text: I love this silverware set. Everything is perfect and shiny! The silverware pieces are continental sized (bigger than the US sets) and well balanced. My husband has big hands so this set was a must for him. I highly recommend the silverware set due to quality and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Betina Yurkus

customer_reviews.title: Quality and appearance is a great
customer_reviews.text: This one is what we’re looking for and we are glad to finally received the package. Nice packaging, shiny and elegantly produced!
customer_reviews.author: AgnesK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set ..
customer_reviews.text: Love this set , it feel substantial in your hand , but not too heavy . The set came with a hostess set witch is always nice to have when serving at a party . I just received the set and have not put it through the wriggers of everyday life yet ,But the quality sure seems like I will have this set for a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful product. It’s so nice they included the matching accessories like the butter knife nd serving fork. I also love that they are a set of 12!for entertaining. Henkel always produces a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Silverware - Very Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: We were highly impressed by the quality of our flatware set. Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Schantz

customer_reviews.title: In addition
customer_reviews.text: A+++ set,get in addition the thin steak knives to complete the set
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Salto

customer_reviews.title: Shiny And no Fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Smoke! This set is so polished and shiny! It doesn’t even show fingerprints. It’s an excellent value for a very nice set of cutlery. I’m pleased with my purchase. 😊
customer_reviews.author: JanJan2017

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. Well weighted and balanced. Looks can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Was so pleased with the quality and feel. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It  is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flatware for everyday use. It is very pretty and has an elegant look and feel to it. Plus, it is a large set so we don't have to wash forks every day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable, but Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set but somewhat lightweight. Have had for about a month now, and it has grown on me. Always shiny after washing--does not spot easily. Even though I expected a heavier set, I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is very substantial flatware at an excellent price. The tines on the fork are a nice length and the teaspoons are a good size. The weight is good and so is the shine. The serving pieces are a nice bonus. Great price for service for twelve and extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Great set of silverware.
customer_reviews.text: Great silverware set! Great weight 18/10, sturdy, and beautiful. Washes nice in my dishwasher. I would highly recommend this set. Good price too. Looks like it will last for years to come. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TammieK

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as expected.
customer_reviews.text: it is very shiny. not as heavy as I had hoped. I considered returning it; however changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these after my wife and I got married recently. They are great flatware by a brand that we trust. Some of the best quality flatware that we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Yosemitebuffs

customer_reviews.title: Really looks like a quality set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift. Really looks like a quality set. Very shiny and heavy weight. Not no cheap looking set. Very happy with this. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a set.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hodgen

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Every time we take a piece of this flatware out of the drawer, we all exclaim, "I love this spoon (or knife, or fork); a beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: Ea Norlock

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to use beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Was so impressed with the quality bought a second set as we have a big family and run out of clean silverware often.
customer_reviews.author: JWCooks

customer_reviews.title: Then I ordered a single replacement spoon from a vendor and liked it enough that I ordered 2 sets of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are quality. I went back and forth about ordering silverware without actually seeing them. Then I ordered a single replacement spoon from a vendor and liked it enough that I ordered 2 sets of the Henckels. My whole family loves them. They feel nice in the hand - have a nice weight to them. I certainly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lordi

customer_reviews.title: High quality elegant cutlery.
customer_reviews.text: Really elegant cutlery. Not so fussy you can't use for daywear, and high quality enough for entertaining. Substantial feel when handled.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F Obermaier

customer_reviews.title: Cheap version of what used to be a good company
customer_reviews.text: One month in, taking very careful steps like drying immediately after washing and already have pits in one knife. Rusty
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kras

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is okay. Not as I expected but it'll pass for daily use. It feels cheap and light.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: They feel heavy duty! Look beautiful. Very reasonably priced for a 12 serving set. Absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.author: Lori J

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in the hands, doesn't feel cheap at all.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set of utensils and the extra serving table ware is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: An attractive set of flatware at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around attractive set of stainless steel flatware. The shape of each utensil is nicely proportioned and feels good in the hand. The design is simple, but pretty, and all this for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Hoover

customer_reviews.title: High quality, classy, sturdy, worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good-looking set of silverware that's got some "heft" (weight) to it, and will last. After viewing some of the problems buyers have with some other major brands, I decided that Henckels is a great brand with a great reputation, and I liked the pattern of this set. They're very nice. Look great. Feel great. Seem like they'll last forever. Just what I wanted... :-)
customer_reviews.author: TravellingBuckeye

customer_reviews.title: Great value. I just wish that I could order ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I just wish that I could order another set of tea spoons and dinner forks.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette A Voytek

customer_reviews.title: Uneven length for dinner spoon and fork
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shiny not too heavy. It’s strange though that the dinner spoon is at least 1” shorter than the dinner fork!?!
customer_reviews.author: M.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We use it for kitchen cutlery . It has a good weight , good feel in my hand and looks good after the dishwasher. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality German 1810 stainless for under $100.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are very pleased with the appearance, quality, and function of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful2019

customer_reviews.title: nice quality - nice set
customer_reviews.text: nice set - we like them more with each use.
customer_reviews.author: Gennady L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice,
customer_reviews.text: Nice, subdued pattern, Seem to stain if not dried at once.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Recommend drying after washing
customer_reviews.text: Decent flatware for price. Haven’t notive any rust. Recommend drying after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets and use them daily. It's been a month and they still look new. I put them in the dishwasher and don't really baby them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S. Birk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set and the gift recipient was excited to receive ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift. Very nice set and the gift recipient was excited to receive this set.
customer_reviews.author: tngrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, bright, shiny, and of decent weight, it is nice to have new every day flatware and enough pieces that I don't have to run the dishwasher more than every 3days!
customer_reviews.author: JulieG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this set, had them for about 2 months now. The wight is just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Steward

customer_reviews.title: Lovely dinnerware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sweet daughter in love and the cutlery looked beautiful. Good and heavy but the design is delicate and looks so classy. It arrived in good time and well packaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.H

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Henckels set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. However the pieces are not as big or as heavy as some of the reviews led me to believe. Although it carries the Henckels name it is not the Henckels quality I am used to. A little disappointed but will keep it as an every day set.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time ( it was a gift) Beautiful Pattern, perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time ( it was a gift) Beautiful Pattern, perfect weight, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozy

customer_reviews.title: Quite a step above sporks!
customer_reviews.text: Yipee, new tableware which actually matches! This is beautiful and makes even my meals a celebration.
customer_reviews.author: Glen J

customer_reviews.title: I didnt think people noticed brand names on items like these but they sure do thanks it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think people noticed brand names on items like these but they sure do thanks it was a great feeling knowing I could serve dinner with the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they are very nice looking and the price is great for a 65 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet, but they are very nice looking and the price is great for a 65 piece set.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and weight unlike my Wallace Continental bead set that is so heavy & bulky that no one wants to use the dinner forks. I bought this set with a little bit of trepidation because it was much cheaper that any of the other 18/10 sets but I'm so glad I did! It is beautiful as well - I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wallik

customer_reviews.title: Henckels Stainless steel flatware.
customer_reviews.text: great quality as is each product made by J. A. Henckels .
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ginder

customer_reviews.title: Super stainless!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased! Nice weight and style. Something new after 45 years!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: buy it you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flatware set......we are very pleased. Knives are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Silverware washes up nicely and doesn't have water spots from the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Well made and not too heavy. Silverware washes up nicely and doesn't have water spots from the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flatware
customer_reviews.text: This flatware a good heavy weight and well made. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Boy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter than I expected but still a nice set
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great amount of merchandise for the price. Sturdy, but not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shiny flatware
customer_reviews.text: So nice I almost didn’t want to use them lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hull

customer_reviews.title: good weight and size
customer_reviews.text: No waterspotting, good weight and size. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PMH

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Simple Design
customer_reviews.text: As far as flatware goes, this is a nice and simple design. The quality has been good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Henckels Flatware Set
customer_reviews.text: amazing quality...love the set, it's a must have in your collection. it's quality that will surely last for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Nadira

customer_reviews.title: I like that it’s more than a serving for
customer_reviews.text: Not to heavy. I like that it’s more than a serving for 8
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new silver. I bought two sets so there will be plenty of beautiful matching silver for the next family gathering. High quality and perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid weight
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I have been looking for. Nice solid weight. I love how they shine. The teaspoons are a bit larger than I am used to but definitely not a drawback. A fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Nana2two

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful set. Fits my hand very well without being ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful set. Fits my hand very well without being too thick or bulky. The finish is much nicer than other sets I looked at. The pattern is simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Iffrig

product_meta.title: HENCKELS J.A Flatware Set, 65 Piece, Silver
product_meta.description: J.A. HENCKELS INTERNATIONAL Alcea 65 PC flatware set (12 - 5 Pc place settings plus serving spoon, serving fork, slotted serving spoon, butter knife and sugar spoon).
feature_bullets: Plus serving spoon, serving fork, slotted serving spoon, butter knife and sugar spoon

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
